attributes.action: Prevent the Government from Suspending Parliament and Enabling a No Deal Brexit
attributes.additional_details: Parliament is the basis of democracy in the UK. Deliberately suspending it to allow the government to determine unchecked how the UK exits the EU without any parliamentary involvement is fundamentally and literally undemocratic.
attributes.background:
The Government seeks to suspend Parliament in order to enable a No Deal Brexit. This is undemocratic & against all promises made during the Referendum campaign. 
We, the undersigned, demand that Parliament be allowed to function and represent the will of the people during this crucial time.
